name: merchantbot
description: discord bot for searching on mercarijp

scripts.start: npm run build  && node dist/deploy-commands.js && node dist/index.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node dist/deploy-commands.js && NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && node dist/deploy-commands.js && pm2 reload dist/index.js --name merchant-bot --update-env || pm2 start dist/index.js --name merchant-bot && pm2 save
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node dist/deploy-commands.js && NODE_ENV=production pm2 reload dist/index.js --name merchant-bot --update-env || NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/index.js --name merchant-bot && pm2 save

author: celen
